1628120.name: Rollers of the Realm: Reunion
1628120.description:
Sequel to the award-winning Rollers of the Realm, this all new Pinball + RPG adventure takes you on a quest where your party of quirky pinball heroes roll out “ye-olde-pinball-style” to collect loot, thwart some bad guys and save the Realm.


As you roll around the map, you’ll discover new playfields; locations like castles and graveyards with pinball flippers built in. Launch your pinball heroes into action to smash into goblins and guards, find treasure or even boop a sheep. Learn to hot-swap your heroes mid-battle for strategic mastery and level up quickly. Use your loot to upgrade each of your pinball heroes’ abilities and items.

Complete Campaign goals on each playfield to reveal new chapters in the story, unlock new Challenges to grind on and reveal new Ranked Playfields where you can flex your pinball skills on your friends or take on the world as you compete for leaderboard high scores.


  • Pinball + RPG perfected! An all new game building on the best of the original award winning mashup
  • Flip into enemies to fight, roll, dash and bounce to navigate mazes and maps
  • Campaign with lovable characters and dozens of pinball playfields with high replay value
  • Ranked Playfields to compete for high scores on friends and global leaderboards
  • Split-Flipper: 2-player couch co-op with split controls.
  • Manage a party of 5 pinball heroes with unique stats, mighty abilities and upgrades
  • Build your strategy and skill and hot swap hero roster during play for tactical advantage
